full_title: Flowers in the Dirt by Paul McCartney
name: Flowers in the Dirt
name_with_artist: Flowers in the Dirt (artist: Paul McCartney)

songs.full_title: My Brave Face by Paul McCartney
songs.title: My Brave Face
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
My brave, my brave
My brave face

[Verse 1]
I've been living in style
Unaccustomed as I am to the luxury life
I've been hitting the town and it didn't hit back
I've been doing the rounds
Unaccustomed as I am to the time on my hands
Now I don't have to tell anybody when I'm gonna get back

[Bridge 1]
Ever since you went away, I've had
This sentimental inclination not to change a single thing
As I pull the sheet back on the bed
I want to go bury my head in your pillow

[Pre-Chorus]
Now that I'm alone again
I can't stop breaking down again
The simplest things set me off again
Take me to that place

[Chorus]
Where I can't find my brave face
Where I can't find my brave face
My brave, my brave, my brave face

My brave face

[Verse 2]
I've been living a lie, unaccustomed as I am
To the work of a housewife, I've been breaking up
Dirty dishes and been throwing them away

[Bridge 2]
Ever since you left I have been trying to compose a
'Baby, will you please come home?' Note meant for you
As I clear away another untouched TV dinner
From the table I laid for two

[Pre-Chorus]
Now that I'm alone again
I can't stop breaking down again
The simplest things set me off again
Take me to that place

[Chorus]
Where I can't find my brave face
Where I can't find my brave face
My brave, my brave, my brave face

[Outro]
My brave face

songs.full_title: Rough Ride by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Rough Ride
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I needed loving, I needed a friend
I needed something that would be there in the end

[Chorus]
Of the rough ride to Heaven
Want to get inside; what will I do?
Oh, on a rough ride to Heaven
I want to get inside to be with you

[Verse 2]
I knew you'd help me, I knew you could
You knew I didn't want to be misunderstood

[Chorus]
Of the rough ride to Heaven
Want to get inside; what will I do?
Oh, on a rough ride to Heaven
I want to get inside to be with you

[Verse 3]
I'm not asking for an easy passage
So I hope you understand
I'm not after any special treatment
But I wouldn't mind a hand

[Outro]
On a rough ride, on a rough ride
On a rough ride, on a rough ride
On a rough ride To Heaven
Want to get inside; what will I do?

songs.full_title: You Want Her Too by Paul McCartney (Ft. Elvis Costello)
songs.title: You Want Her Too
songs.title_with_featured: You Want Her Too (Ft. Elvis Costello)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
She makes me go so wrong
(Yeah you kept me awake you know you did)
I've loved her, oh, so long
(So why don't you come right out and say it, stupid?)

[Chorus]
She makes me do things I don't want to do
I don't know why I should be telling you
I know that you want her too

[Verse 2]
My intentions are quite sincere
(That's not what you said the other night)
And all you can do is sneer
(So go ahead and kid yourself, you're right)

[Chorus]
She makes me do things I don't want to do
I don't know why I should be telling you
I know that you want her too

[Bridge]
I've got a better chance than you do
I know that you want her too
You're such a hopeless romantic
She told me you're so predictable and nice
She only did you a favor once or twice (once or)
Once or twice

[Verse 3]
She makes me go so wrong
(So why don't you lie back and enjoy it?)
My conscience is clear and strong
(Yes, she says I'm just the boy for it)

[Chorus]
She makes me do things I don't want to do
I don't know why I should be telling you
I know that you want her too
I know that you want her too
I know that you want her too

songs.full_title: Distractions by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Distractions
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
What is this thing in life that persuades me to spend
Time away from you?
If you can answer this, you can have the moon
This is the place to be, anyway you can see
There's a lovely view
Why are there always so many other things to do?

[Chorus 1]
Distractions, like butterflies, are buzzing around my head
When I'm alone, I think of you
And the life we'd lead if we could only be free
From these distractions

[Verse 2]
The postman's at the door while the telephone rings
On the kitchen wall
Pretend we're not at home, and they'll disappear
I want to be with you, tell me what I can do
Nothing is too small
Away from all this jazz, we could do anything at all

[Chorus 2]
Distractions, like butterflies, are buzzing around my head
When I'm alone, I think of you
And the things we'd do if we could only be through
With these distractions

[Bridge]
I'll find the peaceful place far a way from the noise of a busy day
Where we can spend our nights counting shooting stars

[Chorus 2]
Distractions, like butterflies, are buzzing around my head
When I'm alone, I think of you
And the things we'd do if we could only be through
With these distractions

[Chorus 1]
Distractions, like butterflies, are buzzing around my head
When I'm alone, I think of you
And the life we'd lead if we could only be free
From these distractions

songs.full_title: We Got Married by Paul McCartney
songs.title: We Got Married
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Going fast, coming soon
We made love in the afternoon
Found a flat, after that
We got married
Working hard for the dream
Scoring goals for the other team
Times were bad, we were glad
We got married

[Chorus 1]
I love the way you open up your hearts to each other
When you find a meeting of the minds
Just as well love was all we ever wanted
It was all we ever had

[Verse 2]
Further on in the game
Waiting up till the children came
Place your bets, no regrets
We got married, we got married, we got married
Nowadays every night flashes by
At the speed of light
Living life, loving wife
We got married

[Chorus 2]
Ohh, I love the things that happen when we start to discover
Who we are and what we're living for
Just because love was all we ever wanted
It was all we ever had

[Outro]
It's not just a loving machine
It doesn't work out if you don't work out at it
It's not just a loving machine
It doesn't work out if you don't work out at it
It's not just a loving machine
It doesn't work out if you don't work out at it
It's not just a loving machine
It doesn't work out if you don't work out at it
It's not just a loving machine
It doesn't work out if you don't work out at it
It's not just a loving machine
It doesn't work out if you don't work out at it

songs.full_title: Put It There by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Put It There
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Give me your hand
I'd like to shake it
I want to show you I'm your friend
You'll understand
If I can make it clear
It's all that matters in the end

[Chorus]
"Put it there if it weights a ton"
That's what a father says to his young son
"I don't care if it weights a ton
As long as you and I are here, put it there
Long as you and I are here, put it there"

[Verse 2]
If there's a fight, I'd like to fix it
I hate to see things go so wrong
The darkest night and all it's mixed emotions
Are getting lighter sing along

[Chorus]
"Put it there if it weights a ton"
That's what a father says to his young son
"I don't care if it weights a ton
As long as you and I are here, put it there
Long as you and I are here, put it there"

songs.full_title: Figure of Eight by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Figure of Eight
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
Well, you've got me dancing in a figure of eight
Don't know if I'm coming or going, I'm early or late
Round and round the ring I go
I want to know
I want to know

[Verse 1]
Why can't we travel a continuous line?
Make a love a reliable covenant all the time
Up and down the hills I go
I got to know
I got to know

[Chorus 2]
Is it better to love one another
Than to go for a walk in the dark?
Is it better to love than to give in to hate?
Yeah, we'd better take good care of each other
Avoid slipping back off the straight and narrow
It's better by far than getting stuck in a figure of eight

[Bridge]
Well, figure it out for yourself, little girl
I don't go nowhere at all
It's nothing more than a tape loop in a big dance hall

[Chorus 1]
Well, you've got me dancing in a figure of eight
Don't know if I'm coming or going, I'm early or late
Round and round the ring I go
I want to know
I want to know

[Chorus 2]
Is it better to love one another
Than to go for a walk in the dark?
Is it better to love than to give in to hate?
Yeah, we'd better take good care of each other
Avoid slipping back off the straight and narrow
It's better by far than getting stuck in a figure of eight

songs.full_title: This One by Paul McCartney
songs.title: This One
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
This one, this one, this one
This one, this one...

[Verse 1]
Did I ever take you in my arms, look you in the eye
Tell you that I do?
Did I ever open up my heart
And let you look inside?

[Chorus]
If I never did it, I was only waiting
For a better moment that didn't come
There never could be a better moment
Than this one, this one
The swan is gliding above the ocean
A god is riding upon his back
How calm the water and bright the rainbow
Fade this one to black

[Verse 2]
Did I ever touch you on the cheek, say that you were mine
Thank you for the smile?
Did I ever knock upon your door
Try to get inside?

[Chorus]
If I never did it, I was only waiting
For a better moment that didn't come
There never could be a better moment
Than this one, this one
The swan is gliding above the ocean
A god is riding upon his back
How calm the water and bright the rainbow
Fade this one to black

[Bridge]
What opportunities did we allow to flow by
Feeling like the timing wasn't quite right?
What kind of magic might have worked if we had stayed calm?
Couldn't I have given you a better life?

[Verse 3]
Did you ever take me in your arms, look me in the eye
Tell me that you do?
Did I ever open up my heart
Let you look inside?

[Chorus]
If I never did it, I was only waiting
For a better moment that didn't come
There never could be a better moment
Than this one, this one
The swan is gliding above the ocean
A God is riding upon his back
How calm the water and bright the rainbow
Fade this one to black

[Outro]
This one is gliding, oh
A God is riding, oh
How calm the water
How calm the water and bright the rainbow

songs.full_title: Don't Be Careless Love by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Don’t Be Careless Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Burn the midnight lamp down until the dawn
I'll keep watch until I'm sure you're coming home
Shadows play and flicker on the bedroom wall
They turn into a bad dream overnight
Something could be terribly wrong

[Chorus 1]
Don't be careless love[x2]
Don't be, don't be careless

[Verse 2]
In my dream you're running nowhere
Every step you've taken turns to glue
Walking down a spiral staircase
Failing through, failing through

[Chorus 2]
Don't be careless love
Be careless love

[Verse 3]
The lamp burns down and out
I'm getting pretty tired of this
I feel so bad, something might be going amiss
I won't be there so look out for yourself
You're getting in deep whatever you do
Don't let me go back to sleep

[Chorus 1]

[Verse 4]
Saw your face in the morning paper
Saw your body rolled up in a rug
Chopped up into two little pieces
By some thug

[Chorus 2]

[Verse 5]
But in the morning light
When I wake up again
You're by my side and that's the way it's always been
But in the dark your mind plays funny tricks on you
Your mind plays funny tricks on you[x2]
Don't be careless love

songs.full_title: That Day is Done by Paul McCartney
songs.title: That Day is Done
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I feel such sorrow
I feel such shame
I know I won't arrive on time
Before whatever out there is gone
What can I do, that day is done
It's just a promise, that I made
I said I'd walk in her parade
Hot scalding tears I thought would flow
Still in my heart they'll never show

[Chorus]
That day is done, that day is done
You know where I've gone
I won't be coming back
That day is done

[Verse 2]
Well I recall, the time and place
When they announced her precious face
I thought at once my heart would burst
Still, every time is like the first
There was applause when she stepped up
I wished that I could interrupt
I made no sign, I made no sound
I know I must stay underground

[Chorus]
That day is done, that day is done
You know where I've gone
I won't be coming back
That day is done

[Verse 3]
That's why she walks, or so they say
She always knew just what I needed
Now if she would, just look my way
One time before they proceed
She sprinkles flowers in the dirt
That's when a thrill becomes a hurt
I know I'll never see her face
She walks away from my resting place

[Chorus]
That day is done, that day is done
You know where I've gone
I won't be coming back
That day is done

songs.full_title: How Many People by Paul McCartney
songs.title: How Many People
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
How many people stand in a line?
How many people never get a chance to shine?
If you can tell me, I'll gladly listen
How many people have died?

[Chorus]
One too many right now for me
I want to be happy, I want to be free
One too many right now for me
I want to see ordinary people living peacefully

[Verse 2]
How many people go for a ride?
How many people never make it through to the other side?
If you can tell me, I'll gladly listen
How many people have cried?

[Chorus]
One too many right now for me
I want to be happy, I want to be free
One too many right now for me
I want to see ordinary people living peacefully

[Verse 3]
How many people will it take?
How many people for goodness sake?
How many people?
How many people?
One too many

songs.full_title: Motor of Love by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Motor of Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I can't get over your love
No matter how hard life seems
There's a light in my dreams
Thanks to you
My friends keep asking me why
There's such a smile on my face
There's a home at my place
Thanks to you

[Pre-Chorus]
I don't want anything from you
Turn on your motor of love

[Chorus]
Motor of love, motor of love
Heavenly father look down from above
I can't get over your powerful
Motor of love

[Verse 2]
I can't get over your love
No matter how lost I feel
I know my love is real
Thanks to you
You simply reached out your hand
And touched me deep in my soul
I came in out of the cold
Thanks to you

[Pre-Chorus]
I won't steal anything from you
You give me more than enough

[Chorus]
Motor of love, motor of love
Heavenly father look down from above
I can't get over your powerful
Motor of love

[Verse 3]
There was a time
When I was down and counted out
Well I remember I felt so bad
I nearly threw away
Nearly threw away the keys

[Outro]
Motor of love, motor of love
Heavenly father look down from above
Motor of love, motor of love
Heavenly father look down from above
I can't get over your powerful
Motor of love

songs.full_title: Ou Est Le Soleil? by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Ou Est Le Soleil?
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Où est le soleil?
Où est le soleil?
Dans la tête
Dans la tête
Où est le soleil?
Dans la tête
Travaillez

Où est le soleil?

Dans la tête
Où est le soleil?

Où est le soleil? (où est le soleil?)

Dans la tête (dans la tête)

songs.full_title: Flying To My Home by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Flying To My Home
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I'm flying to my home

[Verse 1]
The sun is fading in the west
Out where the cattle roam
I'm like a bird at the end of the day
Flying to my home
I'm flying to my home sweet majesty
I'm flying to my home

[Verse 2]
The sky is like a painted flag
Above a sea of chrome
I've got a woman living in my life
Living in my home
I'm flying to my home sweet majesty
I'm flying to my home

[Chorus]
I haven't been back for so long
I don't know if I'm going to recognize it
They gave the old place a new face
And I'm going to take some time
To size the situation up

I haven't been back for so long
I don't know if I'm going to recognize it
They gave the old place a new face
And I'm going to take some time
To size the situation up

[Verse 3]
The sun is fading in the west
Out where the cattle roam
I've got a woman living in my life
Living in my home
I'm flying to my home sweet majesty
I'm flying to my home

[Outro]
I'm flying to my home sweet majesty
I'm flying to my home

songs.full_title: So Like Candy (Original Demo) by Paul McCartney (Ft. Elvis Costello)
songs.title: So Like Candy (Original Demo)
songs.title_with_featured: So Like Candy (Original Demo) (Ft. Elvis Costello)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Here lies the powder and perfume
The pretty clothes are scattered 'round the room
And it's so like Candy
Here lies the lipstick and the face
The colored tablets keep it all in place
And it's so like Candy
So like Candy

[Chorus]
What did I do to make her go?
Why must she be the one that I have to love
So like Candy?

[Verse 2]
Here lies a picture of a girl
Her arms are tight around that lucky guy
And it's so like Candy
And in her eyes a certain look
I thought I'd seen the last of long ago
And it's so like Candy
So like Candy

[Chorus]
What did I do to make her go?
Why must she be the one that I have to love
So like Candy?

[Verse 3]
I remember the day that picture was taken
We were so happy then, but that's so like Candy
She seemed so sweet to me I was mistaken
Oh no, not that again, but that's so like Candy
She just can't face the day
So she turns and melts away

Here lie the records that she scratched
And on the sleeve I find a note attached
And it's so like Candy
"My Darling Dear it's such a waste"
She couldn't say "goodbye", but "I admire your taste"
And it's so like Candy
So like Candy

songs.full_title: Return to Pepperland by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Return to Pepperland
songs.lyrics:
My cousin Lil comes home at eight
That's late for her
Her husband Dan just doesn't show 'til she's in bed
That's when he dons his latest listening device
And hears the right nice music in his head

Return to Pepperland
Come back to love and peace, return today
Return to Pepperland
It's not a mile away

The children Bill and Kate live near
A year apart
While as for Gran she stays downstairs they're very kind
She thinks of ancient mysteries running through her life
And gets them all mixed up inside her mind, mmhmm

Return to Pepperland
Come back to love and peace, return today
Return to Pepperland
It's not a mile away

Da, da, da, da
Da, da, da, da, da, da, da, da, da, da
You don't go away
It's starting to play
Play it forever (Return)
And ever (to Pepperland)
Uh-oh (It's not a mile away)

Dear old Dad
What are you writing now?

Twenty years later, who would have guessed?
Nelson Mandela still under arrest
People demanding
Love understanding
Why don't we do something now?

My cousin Min is
Never in, the big men say
"Wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa
Wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, wa, WA, wa wa wa wa wa"

Return to Pepperland
Come back to love and peace, return today
Return to Pepperland
It's not a mile away

Return to Pepperland
Come back to love and peace, return today
Return to Pepperland
It's not a mile away

songs.full_title: The First Stone by Paul McCartney
songs.title: The First Stone
songs.lyrics:
Hey, you sinners, open all the doors
Have I got news for you
About that money loving preach of yours

Friday night you'll find him taking pictures
Of a model in a cheap hotel
Sunday morning he's raving from the pulpit
Threatening to send us all to hell, well, well

Don't throw, don't throw, don't throw
Don't throw any stones
If you can't live by what you teach
You better leave alone

Don't throw, don't throw, don't throw
Don't throw any stones
Unless you practice what you preach
You'll never find love

Can't find love
Can't find love
Can't find love
Can't find love

Don't throw, don't throw, don't throw
Don't throw any stones
If you can't live by what you teach
You better leave alone

Don't throw, don't throw, don't throw
Don't throw any stones
Unless you practice what you preach
You'll never find love

Hey, you sinners, well, you never can tell
The glory train is leaving in the morning
But the preacher's there to say farewell, well, well

Can't find love
Can't find love
Can't find love
Can't find love
Can't find love
Can't find love

Yet be you who is without sins, cast the first stone
(the first stone, the first stone, the first stone)

Can't find love
Can't find love
You can't find love
You can't find love

songs.title: Good Sign
songs.lyrics:
That's a good, that's a good sign
That's a good, that's a good sign

Oh, oh (ooh)
Oh, it's a good sign
Oh, oh (ooh)

songs.full_title: I Wanna Cry by Paul McCartney
songs.title: I Wanna Cry
songs.lyrics:
Well, you said you loved me
But you know it was a lie
You said you loved me
But you know it was a lie
And that's the reason, but it's not the only reason
I wanna cry, cry, cry

You said you would find me
But you know you never came, yeah
You told me you would find me, pretty baby
But you know you never came, yeah
Well, the other night, you talked in your sleep, baby
You called out another man's name, yeah

You said you loved me
Oh, but you know it was a lie
You said you loved me
Whoa, but you know it was a lie
Ooh, that's the reason, but it's not the only reason
I wanna cry, cry, cry

songs.full_title: The Loveliest Thing by Paul McCartney
songs.title: The Loveliest Thing
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
To me you are the loveliest thing I've seen all day
You can't take that away
No, you can't take that away
All my life, I wondered why it couldn't be this way
That was up until today
Oh it had to be this way

[Chorus 2]
Today, wait until the morning comes
Before you slip away
Without permission
Without suspicion
Without permission given

[Verse 1]
You seem to have a friendlier smile than all the rest
Well I looked and you were best
Yeah I've looked at all the rest
You can't imagine passionate words that I would say
If only you would stay
Oh you know you got to stay

[Chorus 2]
Today, wait until the morning comes
Before you slip away
Without permission
Without suspicion
Without permission given

[Verse 2]
You used to be and early bird
But how was I to know you would leave without shedding a tear
I only want to love you
I'll make a wish and suddenly I'm glad that I have you here
Oh I'm glad I have you here
Today

[Chorus 1]
To me you are the loveliest thing I've seen all day
You can't take that away
No, you can't take that away
All my life, I wondered why it couldn't be this way
That was up until today
Oh it had to be this way

[Chorus 2]
Today, wait until the morning comes
Before you slip away
Without permission
Without suspicion
Without permission given
